title.value: Responsible AI Considerations in Text Summarization Research: A Review of Current Practices
title.justification: This is the title mentioned at the beginning of the research paper.
title.quote: Responsible AI Considerations in Text Summarization Research: A Review of Current Practices

extractions.description: This paper examines the extent to which responsible AI (RAI) considerations are discussed in text summarization research and provides recommendations on good practices. The authors conducted a qualitative analysis of 333 summarization papers from the ACL Anthology, focusing on responsible AI issues, stakeholder mentions, and evaluation practices.

type.justification: The paper conducts a qualitative analysis of 333 summarization papers to assess current practices in considering responsible AI issues.
type.quote: we examine research and reporting practices in the current literature. We conduct a multi-round qualitative analysis of 333 summarization papers from the ACL Anthology published between 2020–2022.

name.justification: The research paper focuses on text summarization, which is a task within the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP).
name.quote: Text summarization is an important NLP task where the goal is to generate a shorter version of an input text while preserving its main ideas.

name.justification: The paper is centered on text summarization, evaluating how responsible AI considerations are integrated into this specific task.
name.quote: Focusing on text summarization—a common NLP task largely overlooked by the responsible AI community—we examine research and reporting practices in the current literature.
